text: @realDonaldTrump You're a disgrace, I'll never understand how anyone could support Trash like you. An unarmed black Man was killed and you've done nothing. Over 100, 000 People have died from the #Coronavirus which you took as a joke. #DonaldTrump #STFUTrump #Trump #WhiteHouse #JusticeForGeorge
